            inputs_c = inputs * dp_mask[2]
            inputs_o = inputs * dp_mask[3]

            inputs_c = inputs

        x_f = K.dot(inputs_f, self.kernel_f) + self.bias_f
        x_c = K.dot(inputs_c, self.kernel_c) + self.bias_c

    else:
